dcterms:creator: Y. Lecun
L. Bottou
Y. Bengio
P. Haffner
dcterms:description: MNIST dataset is a handwritten digit dataset containing 10 classes of digits from 0 to 9. Each sample is a grayscale image with a size of 28x28. The dataset has a total of 70,000 samples, of which 60,000 are used for training and 10,000 for testing.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: G. Orchard
A. Jayawant
G. K. Cohen
N. Thakor
dcterms:description: The N-MNIST dataset is a neuromorphic version of the MNIST dataset that represents information through asynchronous events. Each sample has a resolution of 34x34.
dcterms:title: N-MNIST

dcterms:creator: H. Xiao
K. Rasul
R. Vollgraf
dcterms:description: Fashion-MNIST is a dataset of clothing images, consisting of 10 categories. It includes 60,000 training samples and 10,000 testing samples, with each image represented as a grayscale 28x28 pixel matrix.
dcterms:title: Fashion-MNIST

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
V. Nair
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: The CIFAR-10 dataset comprises 60,000 natural images of size 32x32, spread across 10 classes, with 6,000 images for each class. The training set contains 50,000 images, while the test set contains 10,000 images.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10
